lead_paragraph: The police officers were ambushed Friday as they left a mosque in the northern province of Zawzjan, and the wife of a police commander was also killed.
snippet: The police officers were ambushed Friday as they left a mosque in the northern province of Zawzjan, and the wife of a police commander was also killed....

headline.main: 10 Police Officers Killed in Ambush by Militants in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: 10 Police Officers Killed in Ambush by ISIS in Afghanistan
